body: This was one of the first hentai I've read, and it's still a very good one.

Not bad. It's Pastel Chime, so that's already a plus (gotta love the classics)...Plus it's Shirley, one of the better girls from PC. And she's wearing the Stingray suit? That's just icing on the cake. 8/10. Two points lost for font size (really hard to read this on a smartphone.) Other than that, another great piece from Noba.
yeah.. the text size ar just too small than another doujin.... but still good work and thanks tho...
@shikabane Why? Was it written so badly/difficultly, even the average Native speaker can't understand?
good job for translating a book of Shirley Corvette
